<!-- these happen to persist their widths in mobile -->
<div class="wk-layout-25-75-persist">
  <div class="wk-layout-item"><span>1/4</span></div>
  <div class="wk-layout-item"><span>3/4</span></div>
</div>
<div class="wk-layout-33-66-persist">
  <div class="wk-layout-item"><span>1/3</span></div>
  <div class="wk-layout-item"><span>2/3</span></div>
</div>
<div class="wk-layout-50-50-persist">
  <div class="wk-layout-item"><span>1/2</span></div>
  <div class="wk-layout-item"><span>1/2</span></div>
</div>
<div class="wk-layout-66-33-persist">
  <div class="wk-layout-item"><span>2/3</span></div>
  <div class="wk-layout-item"><span>1/3</span></div>
</div>
<div class="wk-layout-75-25-persist">
  <div class="wk-layout-item"><span>3/4</span></div>
  <div class="wk-layout-item"><span>1/4</span></div>
</div>

  <div class="wk-layout-item"><span>1/3</span></div>
  <div class="wk-layout-item"><span>1/3</span></div>
</div>

  <div class="wk-layout-item"><span>1/4</span></div>

  <div class="wk-layout-item"><span>1/4</span></div>

Centered Layouts

small
medium
large
<div class="wk-layout-centered-small"><span>small</span></div>
<div class="wk-layout-centered-medium"><span>medium</span></div>
<div class="wk-layout-centered-large"><span>large</span></div>

Build Your Own

Use semantic markup to lay out your view. In this example, article is the grouping container for sections, which are to appear at 50% width on tablet/desktop, and on separate lines on mobile.

Proident mollit consectetur cupidatat nostrud nulla esse magna et est irure officia sunt. Non ipsum eiusmod tempor do et et elit aute non ullamco esse amet. Consequat reprehenderit enim eiusmod laborum est eiusmod enim.

Enim duis velit in fugiat culpa nostrud et duis aute cillum. Id qui voluptate ullamco amet velit cupidatat labore dolore ex minim. Ut officia non sunt Lorem Lorem non commodo fugiat do proident id irure et. 

<article>
  <section>
    <p>Consectetur tempor anim velit excepteur ipsum ullamco officia. Voluptate irure do ad ex ullamco reprehenderit quis magna sunt incididunt ipsum irure labore nisi. Proident eiusmod eiusmod sit enim aute tempor. 
    </p>
  </section>
  <section>
    <p>Ex qui fugiat enim reprehenderit consequat ex pariatur quis dolor dolor dolore est elit. Labore laboris qui non pariatur qui nisi id dolore ipsum. Est ut in aliquip consectetur aliquip aliqua. 
    </p>
  </section>
</article>
article {
    @include wk-layout-50-50('section');

    > section {
        background-color: #0d5898;
        color: #fff;
    }
}
